}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is presumably an 802.11abgn module for enterprise AP's.
*"200-117166-0010G A", the ''BRCM'' logo, "BCM94342EMC", :and "LOG_M11" is silkscreened on the wireless module. *'''BCM94342EMC''' - [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/collateral/pb/4748-PB00-R.pdf BCM4342E] (MAC/PHY/Radio) :802.11n 2 Stream Enterprise PCIe Module Full Mini Card *Both radios are using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=946 ''Skyworks'' (''SiGe'') SE2548A] :([[Skyworks]] SE2548A Dual Band 802.11n FEMs)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
